message: The stench of blood chokes the air.
When I move, I hear sloshing noises from the pool of red covering the floor.
I can't be sure, but it feels like I'm still inside Noiz's mind.
Inside that small, empty room, with Noiz chained up on the floor...
Now, I'm chained there with him.

name: ノイズ
message: "Aoba..."
Noiz squeezes his arms around me tighter, burying his face in my chest.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ah... Agh... That hurts...!"
Everywhere Noiz touches me explodes in pain.
His touch tears my skin open, and fresh blood spews forth.
The wounds never close. The pain never stops, and neither does the blood.

And it isn't just happening to me, either.<k> 
The same thing happens when I touch him.
Noiz has never experienced pain before, so the torment must be far worse for him.
I try to avoid touching him... but Noiz deliberately takes my hand, pressing it to his body and opening more wounds.
He smiles through the pain and says:

name: ノイズ
message: "...It hurts."

name: ノイズ
message: "It really hurts... but this is pain. The sensation I never knew..."

...No.<k>
This isn't pain, true pain.
This is all inside your head. You created this world to reflect your desires.
This isn't real.
...But I can't tell him that.
Because I... am also a prisoner of this world.
Escape is no longer possible.

name: ノイズ
message: "It hurts... It hurts. It hurts... Aoba... Haha!"
Noiz rises up and kisses me.
Our lips split and blood gushes forth. Our tongues are shredded as they intertwine.
We embrace each other, wounding each other as we do, sinking deeper into the pool of our blood.
Each jolt of pain is both punishment and proof, proof that we are alive.
In the beginning, I tried to accept Noiz fully. Now, my body lies in tatters.

Neither of us can move anymore...<k>
We just hold each other... forever.

name: ノイズ
message: "Heh, heheh, hahaha, haha...!"
Noiz laughs and laps up my blood with his ragged tongue.

name: ノイズ
message: "I was always alone... but now we'll always be together. You'll be with me."

name: ノイズ
message: "I just want to stay like this. As long as I have this pain and you..."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm happy."

name: ノイズ
message: "Haha, haha..."
